title: Fort Larned National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Â      Volunteer and staff dressed in 19th century U.S. Army uniforms lower the flag for the day. NPS   Fort Larned NHS is open daily from 8:30AM to 4:30PM Central Time. The park is open seven days a week and only closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas Day and New Year's Day. On rare occasions when there is a heavy snowfall or icy conditions we may be closed, or delay opening. Check the website or call ahead if the weather is bad just to be sure we're here. Hours may be extended during special events. See our Calendar for details.
